00023 using namespace std;
00025 void SaveCanvas(const TCanvas* c, const char* name)
00026 {
00027   TFile fout("daqview.root","UPDATE");
00028   if(!fout.IsOpen() || fout.IsZombie()){
00029     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open file daqview.root to save canvas!\n";
00030   }
00031   if(c)
00032     c->Write(name);
00033 }
00034 
00035 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00036 {
00037   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00038   config->SetProgramUsageString("daqview [options] <filename> [<event>]");
00039   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00040   modules->AddCommonModules();
00041   //add rootgraphix first to pass dependencies, but process afterward
00042   RootGraphix* rootgraphix = new RootGraphix;
00043   modules->AddModule(rootgraphix, /*process*/ false, /*register*/ true);
00044   ProcessedPlotter* plotter = new ProcessedPlotter;
00045   modules->AddModule(plotter);
00046   modules->AddModule(rootgraphix, /*process*/ true, /*register*/ false);
00047   
00048   
00049   string list_filename="";
00050   config->AddCommandSwitch('l',"event-list",
00051                            "Read the events to display from <file>",
00052                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<string>(list_filename),
00053                            "file");
00054   int printlevel;
00055   config->RegisterParameter("printlevel",printlevel = 1,
00056                             "Event print verbosity (0=NONE to 3=All info)");
00057   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"printlevel",
00058                            "Event print verbosity (0=NONE to 3=All info)",
00059                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(printlevel),
00060                            "level");
00061   
00062   
00063   try{
00064     config->SetDefaultCfgFile("cfg/daqview.cfg");
00065     config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00066   }
00067   catch(std::exception& e){
00068     Message(EXCEPTION)<<"While processing command line: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00069     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00070   }
00071   if(argc != 3 && argc != 2){
00072     Message(ERROR)<<"Incorrect number of arguments: "<<argc<<std::endl;
00073     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00074   }
00075   ifstream eventlist;
00076   bool use_elist = false;
00077   if(list_filename != ""){
00078     eventlist.open(list_filename.c_str());
00079     if(!eventlist.is_open()){
00080       Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open event-list file "<<list_filename<<endl;
00081       return -1;
00082     }
00083     use_elist = true;
00084   }
00085   
00086     
00087   std::string fname(argv[1]);
00088   Reader reader(fname.c_str());
00089   if(!reader.IsOk())
00090     return 1;
00091   int next_evt = 0;
00092   if (argc == 3 ) next_evt = atoi(argv[2]);
00093   else if(use_elist) eventlist>>next_evt;
00094   if(modules->Initialize()){
00095     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to initialize all modules.\n";
00096     return 1;
00097   }
00098   while(reader.IsOk() && !reader.eof()){
00099     RawEventPtr raw = reader.GetEventWithID(next_evt);
00100     if(!raw){
00101       if(!reader.eof())
00102         Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<next_evt<<"\n";
00103       else
00104         Message(INFO)<<"Reached end of file series.\n";
00105       break;
00106     }
00107     else{
00108       Message(DEBUG)<<"Processing event...\n";
00109       modules->Process(raw);
00110       if( plotter->GetLastProcessReturn()){
00111         //the plotter failed some cut; try the next one
00112         next_evt++;
00113         continue;
00114       }
00115       Message(DEBUG)<<"Done!\n";
00116       Message(DEBUG)<<"Current event has file index "<<reader.GetCurrentIndex()
00117                    <<" and ID "<<raw->GetID()<<"\n";
00118       modules->GetCurrentEvent()->GetEventData()->Print(printlevel);
00119       
00120     }
00121     int this_evt = next_evt;
00122     if(use_elist){
00123       if( !(eventlist>>next_evt)){
00124         Message(INFO)<<"Reached end event-list file.\n";
00125         next_evt = this_evt+1;
00126       }
00127     }
00128     else
00129       next_evt = this_evt+1;
00131     Message(INFO)<<"Enter the next event to view; <enter> for "<<next_evt
00132                  <<", s to save this canvas, q or -1 to quit\n";
00133     std::string line;
00134     getline(std::cin, line);
00135     if( line == "" )
00136       {}
00137     else if(line == "q" || line == "Q" || line == "-1"){
00138       Message(DEBUG)<<"Quitting\n";
00139       break;
00140     }
00141     else if(line == "s" || line == "S"){
00142       Message(INFO)<<"Saving canvas to file daqview.root.\n";
00143       char name[30];
00144       sprintf(name, "Event%d_1",next_evt);
00145       SaveCanvas(plotter->GetCanvas(0),name);
00146       sprintf(name, "Event%d_2",next_evt);
00147       SaveCanvas(plotter->GetCanvas(1),name);
00148     } 
00149     else{
00150       next_evt = atoi(line.c_str());
00151     }
00152   }
00153   modules->Finalize();
00154   return 0;
00155 }
